email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Please confirm the demurrage terms and send over the draft charter party for review. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and demurrage remains at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ll send over the draft charter party shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll review the draft charter party and get back to you by end of day. Appreciate your flexibility on the rate. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, just following up to see if you’ve had a chance to review the draft charter party. Let me know if there are any questions or adjustments needed. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
